title: OpenMC
description: OpenMC is a Monte Carlo particle transport code based on modern methods. It is capable of modeling neutron, photon, and electron transport with a variety of cross section libraries and models for geometry, cross sections, and tallies. OpenMC is developed by the Computational Reactor Physics Group at MIT and is released under the permissive 3-clause BSD license.
